definition: a songlike cry in which the voice fluctuates rapidly between the normal voice and falsetto, to sing by changing register
details:
noun
- a songlike cry in which the voice fluctuates rapidly between the normal voice and falsetto
= example: a songlike cry in which the voice fluctuates rapidly between the normal voice and falsetto
verb
- to sing by changing register
= example: to sing by changing register
= synonyms: warble
